name: Charity Work
description: Good afternoon young man, I have a charity work for you. We need to deliver supplies, but scavs operating in the Customs area still go on with their dirty business. Iâ€™m really not comfortable with this kind of request, but I need you to deliver and hide the supplies. Also, be careful with the sniper guarding the road.
success_message: Thank you, young man. You did an important service to many.

missions.message: Find 1 Car first aid kit in raid
Find 1 CBottle of Water (0.6L) in raid
Stash 1 Army Crackers in bushes, located near sniper road
